snippet.title: Best of Srikanto Acharya | Bengali Song Jukebox | Srikanto Acharya Songs

localized.description:
Songs ::
♪ Achchha Amon To ▬ 00:00
♪ Ektuku Chhonwa Lage ▬ 04:12
♪ Je Chhilo Amar Swapancharini ▬ 08:46
♪ Ei Banglar Matite ▬ 12:39
♪ Shuno Sakhi ▬ 16:56
♪ Nitya Jukto ▬ 21:51
♪ Ami Harate Jani ▬ 27:08
♪ Amar Kono Naam Diyo Na ▬ 32:05
♪ Aaji Barishan Mukharito Srabanaraati ▬ 35:59
♪ Achhe Dukkha, Achhe Mrityu ▬ 39:19

Srikanto Acharya is a Kolkata-based modern Bengali singer-songwriter and music director.Srikanto was born in Kolkata, India and is son of Rohini Nandan Acharya and Kana Acharya. He got formal training in music from Dakshinee. He also got trained in tabla from Ustad Ali Ahmed Khan. He quit his job as a sales professional and then Utpal Chakravarty, proprietor of an old music store convinced him to drop in his cassettes at Sagarika Music. He got a call from them within a week and they offered him a contract to sing for them.

Song Details ::

Song : Achchha Amon To
Singer : Srikanto Acharya
Music Director : Soumitra Chatterjee
Lyricist : Samaresh Mazumder

Song : Ektuku Chhonwa Lage
Singer : Srikanto Acharya
Music Director : Rabindranath Tagore
Lyricist : Rabindranath Tagore

Song : Je Chhilo Amar Swapancharini
Singer : Srikanto Acharya
Music Director : Rabindranath Tagore
Lyricist : Rabindranath Tagore

Song : Ei Banglar Matite
Singer : Srikanto Acharya
Music Director : Joydeb Sen
Lyricist : Joydeb Sen

Song : Shuno Sakhi
Singer : Srikanto Acharya
Music Director : Bappi Lahiri
Lyricist : Rabindranath Tagore

Song : Nitya Jukto
Singer : Srikanto Acharya
Music Director : Kalyan Sen Barat
Lyricist : Subratanath Mukherjee

Song : Ami Harate Jani
Singer : Srikanto Acharya
Music Director : Jatileswar Mukherjee
Lyricist : Jatileswar Mukherjee

Song : Amar Kono Naam Diyo Na
Singer : Srikanto Acharya
Music Director : Joy Sarkar
Lyricist : Saikat Kundu

Song : Aaji Barishan Mukharito Srabanaraati
Singer : Srikanto Acharya
Music Director : Rabindranath Tagore
Lyricist : Rabindranath Tagore

Song : Achhe Dukkha, Achhe Mrityu
Singer : Srikanto Acharya
Music Director : Rabindranath Tagore
Lyricist : Rabindranath Tagore
